about.title: About SwissCleanMove
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for cleaning and moving
about.description: With years of experience, we provide professional cleaning services and moving assistance throughout Switzerland. Our dedicated team ensures the highest quality and customer satisfaction.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We stand by our word and offer 100% deposit guarantee for all our services.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your satisfaction is at the center of our actions. We listen and find individual solutions.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We use environmentally friendly cleaning products and pay attention to sustainable working methods.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Highest quality standards and professional equipment for first-class results.

marco.name: Marco Müller
marco.description: With over 10 years of experience in the cleaning industry, Marco leads our team with passion and expertise.

sarah.name: Sarah Weber
sarah.description: Sarah ensures that every job meets our high quality standards.

thomas.name: Thomas Schneider
thomas.description: Thomas coordinates our cleaning teams and ensures smooth operations.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2019, SwissCleanMove has developed into one of the most trusted providers of cleaning services and moving assistance in Switzerland. Our success is based on the combination of traditional Swiss values such as precision and reliability with modern, efficient working methods.

cta.title: Become Part of Our Success Story
cta.subtitle: Let us solve your cleaning and moving challenges together

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional cleaning and moving services that exceed expectations while maintaining the highest standards of professionalism and environmental responsibility.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Highest quality standards in everything we do

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.subtitle: Important legal information and privacy policy

impressum.liabilityText1: The contents of our pages have been created with the greatest care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the content.
impressum.liabilityText2: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to Section 7, Para. 1 of the TMG. However, according to Sections 8 to 10 of the TMG, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information.
impressum.copyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to Swiss copyright law. Reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

privacy.generalText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website. Personal data is all data that can be used to identify you personally.
privacy.whoResponsible: Who is responsible for data collection?
privacy.whoResponsibleText: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the legal notice of this website.
privacy.howCollect: How do we collect your data?
privacy.howCollectText: Your data is collected on the one hand by you providing it to us. This can be data that you enter in a contact form, for example.
privacy.whyUse: What do we use your data for?
privacy.whyUseText: Part of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right at any time:
rightsList: to receive free information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data
to request correction or deletion of this data
to request a restriction of data processing
privacy.contactFormText: If you send us inquiries via contact form, your details from the inquiry form including the contact data you provided there will be stored with us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.

terms.scopeText: These General Terms and Conditions apply to all contracts between SwissCleanMove GmbH and its customers for the provision of cleaning and moving services.
terms.contractText: The contract is concluded by the customer's acceptance of the offer. Acceptance can be made in writing, orally or through conclusive behavior.
terms.pricingText1: Prices include statutory VAT. Payment is due within 30 days net after invoicing.
terms.pricingText2: In case of payment delay, default interest of 5% above the base rate will be charged.
terms.warrantyText: We guarantee the proper execution of our services. In case of defects, you have the right to free rectification. For move-out cleaning, we offer a 100% acceptance guarantee.
terms.liabilityText: We are only liable for damages in cases of intent and gross negligence. Liability is limited to the amount of the insurance sum. All our employees are fully insured.

cookies.whatAreText: Cookies are small text files that are stored by your web browser on your device to store certain information. Through the stored and returned information, the respective website recognizes that you have already called and visited it with the browser of your device.
cookies.necessaryText: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the website and cannot be deactivated. They are usually only set in response to actions you take.
cookies.functionalText: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization, such as storing your language settings.
cookies.manageText: You can change your cookie settings in your browser at any time. However, please note that deactivating certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

premium.title: Combo Service
features: Price on request for large properties

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.keyInfo: Key information you should know about SwissCleanMove
faq.teamHelp: Our friendly team is here to help. Contact us through any of these channels.

general.question: What areas do you serve?
general.answer: We provide services throughout Switzerland, including major cities like Zurich, Geneva, Basel, Bern, and Lausanne.

general.question: Are you insured?
general.answer: Yes, we are fully insured and bonded. All our employees are covered by comprehensive insurance.

cleaning.question: Do you provide cleaning supplies?
cleaning.answer: Yes, we bring all necessary cleaning supplies and professional equipment to every job.

cleaning.question: What is your deposit guarantee?
cleaning.answer: We offer a 100% deposit back guarantee for move-out cleaning. If the property is not accepted, we will re-clean at no cost.

moving.question: Do you provide packing materials?
moving.answer: Yes, we can provide all necessary packing materials including boxes, bubble wrap, and protective covers.

pricing.question: How do you calculate prices?
pricing.answer: Prices are based on the size of the property, type of service, and specific requirements. We provide free quotes.
